author: costin
msg: It helps if I check in the current version :-)

author: costin
msg: Updated the logging package from cvs-head.
It'll display the currect class name for jdk1.4, and will create a sane
( consistent with the defaults for simple and jdk1.4 ) config for log4j,
Plus it has a Class-Path attribute, so less CLASSPATH required for

author: costin
msg: As previously mentioned, less verbosity unless explicitely configured for debug
( and only debug on the targeted object )

author: costin
msg: Filter more messages based on the debug level of the worker or uri.
Things are getting pretty stable ( except JNI and unix worker, where I still
get crashes from time to time - I suspect some signal problems ), I'll start
loading it up and the messages were too verbose.
Nacho, Henri - if you debug it please set debug=1 on the uri and worker objects.
